detail_desc: Nursing top in soft, patterned jersey with a wrapover front that closes with a press-stud at the top. Practical inner top for easier nursing access and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Blouse in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the front and a small frilled collar with ties. Buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Soft cotton jersey nightdress with a print motif and long, cuffed sleeves.
Waist belt in braided imitation leather with a metal buckle at the front and elastication at the back. Width 7 cm.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
String briefs in lace with a lined gusset.
Metal chain necklaces. One in thin metal chain with a feather-shaped pendant, the other with a pendant in reconstituted stone. Length 50 cm and 65 cm.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved dress in organic cotton slub jersey with buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt with pockets in the side seams and a scalloped hem.
Oval earrings with plastic beads and reconstituted stones. Length approx. 7 cm.
Loose fit, 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Metal earrings in the shape of thin hoops in various designs. Size 1.2 cm to 3 cm.
Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a press-stud at the waist and a fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a key pocket in the waistband. Unlined. Regular fit.
Short, A-line dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, decorative straps at the top, a lined gusset, narrow sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length trousers in a bouclé-look rib knit. Regular waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
Fitted tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Jackets in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless dress in glittery jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft knit. Size 50x170 cm.
Narrow Alice band in metal with a large glittery cobweb on top resembling a tiara.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in a linen and viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a frill trim, and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Sun hats in a cotton weave. One in a solid colour and one with an all-over print. Lined.
Tights in soft lace with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a collar and drawstring, and a zip at the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Shirt in fil à fil cotton with a button-down collar and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Twisted tube scarf in a soft knit.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets and straight legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Longjohns in soft organic cotton jersey with and elasticated waist, button fly and ribbed hems.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, one with a moon-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 38-47 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gently rounded hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and short sleeves.

Sturdy body with a shaping effect on the waist and seat, and underwired, moulded and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes, and glued edges around the legs for a smooth silhouette and no visible seams. Lined gusset with press-studs.
Metal earrings in the shape of flamingos. Length 5 cm.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a jacquard-knit motif on the turned-up hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Fitted, off-the shoulder top in a fine rib knit with a wide lace trim at the top and long sleeves.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in textured-knit jersey made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft jersey with long sleeves.
Hat in a soft, chunky rib knit with a faux fur pompom on the top and sewn-in turn-up.

Short, A-line dress in sequined mesh with a small stand-up collar, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and long raglan balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, ribbed sleeves and slits in the sides. No buttons.
Skirt in washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, front pockets and buttons on the front. The bottom buttons are purely decorative.
Leather sandals with crossover straps and a decorative bow on the front, and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Leather and rubber insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a collar and wrapover V-neck. Low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, belt, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Jacket in corduroy with a faux shearling-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in faux shearling.
Short-sleeved swim top with a motif, stand-up collar and seam with a flounce at the hem. UPF50.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.

Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, and a small frill trim around the armholes. Detachable, braided belt, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke and sleeves.

Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim with appliqués. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Jersey jumpsuit with shimmering metallic stripes. V-neck front and back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist with a drawstring and wide flounce, side pockets and tapered legs. Lined at the top.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless body in jersey containing glittery threads. Deep V-neck at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with narrow sides.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Pleats at the top and a straight-cut hem.
